actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The winter wolf makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The winter wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 DEX save, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The winter wolf's Perception is 20 when perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The winter wolf is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The winter wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the winter wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The winter wolf's Stealth is 18 while in snowy terrain.
